title: Ozone Generation and Chemistry from 222 nm Germicidal Ultraviolet Light in a Fragrant Restroom
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00144C, Paper
Michael Link, Rileigh Robertson, Andrew Shore, Beharang Hamadani, Christina Cecelski, Dustin Poppendieck
Devices using 222 nm germicidal ultraviolet light (GUV222) have been marketed to reduce virus transmission indoors with low risk of occupant harm from direct exposure. GUV222 generates ozone, an indoor...
